results.title: [Hu Shuo's amazing travels]
results.brief_description: Computer animated story about the humble Hu Shuo’s perilous journey through Middle Kingdom in search of the ever-present nature of Da Miao (Miao Miao the Necromancer) and his subsequent encounters with the Fu Bears.

results.title: [How to observe]
results.brief_description: Demonstrates the importance of observation as basic to learning the sciences and the arts. Students are shown that observation can be developed as a skill ande can be improved through applied and guided practice.
